properties.name: birt.runner.workspace
properties.description: Conventional path to Resource Home. Should match BIRT Designer Resource Home location. Shared by all reports.

properties.name: birt.runner.designDir
properties.description: Root path of BIRT report designs

properties.name: birt.runner.loggingDir
properties.description: Logging from the BIRT Engine as report runs

properties.name: logging.path
properties.description: Logging from Spring Boot, default sent to same path as BIRT Engine logs

properties.name: birt.runner.outputDir
properties.description: Location to generate output files during RunThenRender tasks (submit). Includes rptdocument and formatted files (PDF, EXCEL, DOC, HTML...)

properties.name: birt.runner.resourceDir
properties.description: General purpose location for .rptlibrary, .css, .properties, and .js files. Should use relative path within report to this location.

properties.name: birt.runner.scriptLibDir
properties.description: Location of any Java class files used by BIRT Engine for BIRT Event Handlers

properties.name: birt.runner.baseImageURL
properties.description: Location that images generated by chart engine will be built too. Also by convention location of static image files (use relative path withing report)

properties.name: birt.runner.birtRuntimeHome
properties.description: Open Source BIRT, not required. If using OpenText commercial libraries (requires license), specify the location of the library plugins directory.
